casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. CAPITAL ROYALTY PARTNERS II, L.P.
v.
SERROTT 2018-1214 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 17, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Prohibition. On motions for admission pro hac vice of Michael Aigen and Paul B. Lackey. Motions granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission to appear pro hac vice with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
